DOC.brief_summary: The purpose is to investigate safety and tolerability of single and multiple ascending inhaled doses of AZD4818 in healthy Japanese male volunteers.
DOC.brief_title: Safety, Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics of Inhaled Doses of AZD4818 in Healthy Japanese Male Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Provision of informed consent Body Mass Index (BMI) between 18.027.0 kg/m2 No clinically relevant abnormal findings Acute illness which requires medical intervention Definite or suspected personal history of adverse drug reactions or drug hypersensitivity. Clinical relevant disease or disorder (past or present) A history of respiratory disorders
